assetProfile.address2: Plot No. 10 Mangalam Palace, District Centre Sector-3, Rohini
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Relaxo Footwears Limited manufactures and sells footwear for men, women, and children worldwide. It offers footwear, which includes slippers, canvas shoes, rubber flip flops, EVA injected flip flops, PVC DIP shoes, sport shoes, sandals, and PVC DIP casuals. The company operates a portfolio of brands, such as Relaxo, Bahamas, Flite, Sparx, and Schoolmate. It sells its products through distributors and retail stores; and e-commerce platforms. The company also exports its products. Relaxo Footwears Limited was founded in 1976 and is based in New Delhi, India.
